description:
The case is:

compute node1 associated with shared storage pool1
compute node2 associated with shared storage pool2

The expected AllocationRequests returned as the combinations:

cn1 and ss1
cn2 and ss2

But the current implementation returned:

cn1, ss1 and ss2
cn2, ss1 and ss2
title: The AllocationCandidates.get_by_filters returned wrong combination of AllocationRequests

comments.content:
The case is:

compute node1 associated with shared storage pool1
compute node2 associated with shared storage pool2

The expected AllocationRequests returned as the combinations:

cn1 and ss1
cn2 and ss2

But the current implementation returned:

cn1, ss1 and ss2
cn2, ss1 and ss2

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
